game.name: Startup Company
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Startup Company는 여러분이 새로운 회사의 CEO인 비즈니스 시뮬레이션 샌드박스 게임입니다. 고유한 웹사이트를 구축하고 지구에서 가장 큰 규모의 테크 자이언트들과 경쟁해야 합니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Startup Company is a business simulation sandbox game where you’re the CEO of a new company. Your job is to build your very own website and compete against the largest tech giants on the planet!

reviewHighlights.text: TL;DR: I picked this up for around $5, and while I feel I got my money’s worth, I still can’t confidently recommend it. The core design is straightfor...
I bought this, but ITS IMPOSIBLE!!!
